scripts.test: lerna bootstrap && yarn lint && yarn jest --silent
scripts.pub:latest: export LERNA_PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat lerna.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F= "{ print $2 }" | sed -E 's/(version)|[:,",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && lerna exec --no-bail -- npm dist-tag add \$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME@$LERNA_PACKAGE_VERSION latest
